name: Telegram Ad Bot
description: A multi-language Telegram advertising bot with TON payments and automated reposting

ADMIN_IDS.description: Comma-separated list of admin user IDs (e.g., 123456789,987654321)

CHANNEL_ID.description: The Telegram channel ID where ads will be posted (e.g., @yourchannel or -1001234567890)

TON_WALLET_ADDRESS.description: TON wallet address for receiving payments
